Reviews.Title: “Good value for money, no luxury included!”

Reviews.Content: stayed night paid £60 double including breakfast outside looks nice hotel couple minutes walk kings cross location soon step reception realise super budget reception smells smoke cheap receptionist friendly helpful corridor ground floor lack noise customers appalling due loud continual noise suspect boiler neighbours 73 bad luck im fine noisewise extremely tiny double bed bed ive seen described double bed suspect 4ft wide en suite tiny initially cupboard en suite perfectly clean bed comfortable breakfast morning basement windows dingy worst breakfast ive adequate chef toast toast section laugh 0 experience allowed store backpacks hotel nights handy indeed cheap clean hotel excellent location recommend people thinking lines hostel hotel

Reviews.Title: “3 nights was enough......”
Reviews.Author: MrsDaydream
Reviews.Content: husband recently spent 3 nights london chose hotel location bb facility staff pleasant reception lovely night shift couldnt reception batteries tv remote wasnt brand tv freeview pleasant hotel easy 10 min walk euston station road kings cross underground night spent 2nd floor front hotel 20 arrival afternoon lovely view window nice clean tv brew facilites etc night window hear footsteps conversations sirens cars etc husband reception worst nights sleep agreed move hotel ground floor hotel 78 lot slightly larger hear firing night decided stay didnt spend holiday weekend packing unpacking plus hotel location kings cross tube cheap london â£75 pn obviously proves pay breakfast included price fab hot buffet breakfast consisting sausage beans eggs scrambled fried plum tomatoes bacon 2 slices toast kitchen staff sit table dont expect smile toast met grunt twice arrived cereal milk teacoffee orange squash water dont sauces looked plus date ketchup bottles 2007 maybe refilled didnt risk look bit grotty plenty restaurants cafes mcdonalds corner street pizza express block stay london definately probably pay little bit extra stay premier inn mins walk road

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”

Reviews.Content: youre looking ritz isnt clean staff friendly locationwise hotel perfect 510 min walk euston yes bit perfectly adequate price totally fit purpose planning romantic break london hotel basically using base fine complaints people moaning bear mind pay price

Reviews.Content: staff unfriendly breakfast poor cooked fruit juice cereal vegetarian option english included price staff doing guests favour service customers told food quickly arriving 915 white medium bread toasting 2 slices person dont staff loud kitchen noisy tidy chairs safety information fire alarm sounded etc

Reviews.Title: “London dreams / Nighmare!!!!!”

Reviews.Content: basement triple difficulty somehow managed carry suitcase narrow staircase add sight cramped roomso bathroom double bed single bed occupied hardly leaving space move horrible bathroom service ok except location ie st pancras international kings cross stations yes breakfast totally nightmare opt choice

Reviews.Content: worst hotel ive stayed expensive 150 pounds night basement reached narrow musty staircase difficult negotiate heavy suitcases 4 single beds double bed 3 roomy clean clean linen towels maybe paid extra beds bathroom else similar primary school toilets 1960s hang towels grotty shower basic icky plus close st pancras eurostar easy walk breakfast safe security poor light lock door climbed window easily carry valubles hassle call hotel insult hotels boarding house stayed 2 nights depressing desperate stay 1 night leave eurostar day price london worth 60 pounds night 3 people

Reviews.Content: stayed european access euro star hotel tiny space double bed bathroom closet water pressure shower existant hotel charge prices beyond wasnt location st pancras doubt returning customers complete ripoff

Reviews.Content: stayed nights setting eurostar anniversay cruise receptionist change stairs 26 corridor reception desk wondered stairs 26 terrible paid night disgusting hotel light fitting hanging ceiling touching light bulb catch fire left reception tv remote control told kept getting stolen nonethe handle toilet hanging powdered milk yuck bought pint kept sink cool pillow double bed single breakfast nightmare reception told breakfast served 900am bacon wasnt left told late stopped cooking 850 breakfast 820 run cooked food wait cooked cups glasses plates washed terrible food ready wasnt nice itthe worrying fire emergency instructions door fire wouldnt coming london please shop lots value safer stay

Reviews.Title: “Dont read the bad reviews..!!!”
Reviews.Author: josiebrown331
Reviews.Content: booked european hotel 3 nights 4th 7th march 2011 reading reviews worried expect arrived greeted reception nice lady helpful throughout stay staff friendly breakfast wonderful clean planing spending time maybe hotel isnt hearty breakfast bed sleep book enjoy trip london booking worries returning hotel location sightseeing tube bus trips suggest buy oyster card
